definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">tooltip_event</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:HarvesterMask.helmet</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="is_key_pressed"><field name="key">Shift</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="1"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§7Counts toward the full set</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="1"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§7When worn:</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="1"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> §9-The wearer is immune to Hexed</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="1"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§7When attacking a foe with Hexed bare-handed:</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="1"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> §9-Removes Hexed from the foe, dealing more damage than if the effect would end naturally. The removed Hexed transforms into Absorption with the level based on the damage build up of Hexed. The Absorption has no limits, but is temporary</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="1"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§7Upon killing a foe:</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="1"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> §9-Transforms their soul into a lethal projectile that targets nearby victims and inflicts Hexed III</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§6Press Shift to show
